definitions.definition: An act of spending time idly and unfruitfully ; a dawdling .
An act of moving or walking lackadaisically , a dawdling; a leisurely or slow walk or other journey .
Synonym of dawdler ( “ a person who dawdles or idles ” ) .

main_definition: An act of spending time idly and unfruitfully ; a dawdling .
secondary_definitions: An act of moving or walking lackadaisically , a dawdling; a leisurely or slow walk or other journey .
Synonym of dawdler ( “ a person who dawdles or idles ” ) .

definitions.definition: Alternative spelling of doddle ( “ a job , task , or other activity that is easy to complete or simple ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative spelling of doddle ( “ a job , task , or other activity that is easy to complete or simple ” ) .
